quote: You're gorgeous, you old hag, and if I could give you just one gift ever for the rest of your life it would be this. Confidence. It would be the gift of confidence. Either that or a scented candle
quote_letters: YOURE GORGEOUS YOU OLD HAG AND IF I COULD GIVE YOU JUST ONE GIFT EVER FOR THE REST OF YOUR LIFE IT WOULD BE THIS CONFIDENCE IT WOULD BE THE GIFT OF CONFIDENCE EITHER THAT OR A SCENTED CANDLE
